author: Tuan Pham
funwithnumberz

text:
When $MSFT acquires $ATVI Microsoft's stock would dip. You wouldn't buy $MSFT right now if you think the deal closes soon. As others pointed out, you would want to buy $ATVI instead.

She probably had other reasons to buy $MSFT. I doubt her purchase is related to the merger.
author: Bankenrepublik

text:
BREAKING: Today the New Zealand Trade Commission issued a statement to add more information on whether or not to authorize the Proposed Acquisition by July 17, 2023

https://pdf_file/0031/319576/Microsoft-Corporation2C-Activision-Blizzard-Inc-Statement-of-Issues-20-June-2023.pdf…

The decision date may be extended for as long as the investigation progresses
